sentences.en: Article 6. The archives and documents of the mission shall be inviolable.
sentences.cn: 第六条使馆的档案和文件不受侵犯.

sentences.en: Basic law or tradition was considered inviolable.
sentences.cn: 基本法律或传统被认为神圣不可侵犯.

sentences.en: China's territorial land, inland waters, territorial seas and territorial airspace are inviolable.
sentences.cn: (英译汉)中国的领土 、 内陆水域 、 领海及领空是神圣、不可侵犯的.

sentences.en: Freedom of action is one of the inviolable rules of human behavior.
sentences.cn: 行动自由是人类行为的不可侵犯的规则之一.
他的图书室是个不可侵犯的地方.

sentences.en: Home ( s ) of citizens are inviolable.
sentences.cn: 公民 住宅 不受侵犯.

sentences.en: Human dignity inviolable. It must be respected and protected.
sentences.cn: 人性尊严不可侵犯, 其必须受尊重与保护.
马克罗里的身躯也显得神圣不可侵犯.

sentences.en: Socialist public property is sacred and inviolable.
sentences.cn: 国王是不可侵犯的;神圣的誓言.

sentences.en: The game had a single inviolable rule: obstacles were to be overcome, not circumvented.
sentences.cn: 这个游戏有一个单一的不可违反的规则：困难是被克服的，不是被回避的。

sentences.en: The person of the king is inviolable.
sentences.cn: 国王本人是神圣不可侵犯的.

sentences.en: The personal dignity of citizens is inviolable, so are their residences.
sentences.cn: 人格尊严是不可侵犯的公民, 所以他们的住所.

sentences.en: The supersession of the old by the new is a general, eternal and inviolable law of the universe.
sentences.cn: 新陈代谢是宇宙间普遍的永远不可抵抗的规律.

sentences.en: Yesterday's resolution says the present Polish border is "inviolable".
sentences.cn: 昨天的决议称现在的波兰边界是“不可侵犯的”。

words.tran_cn: 无污点的；未亵渎的，未受侵犯的
不可侵犯的；神圣的；不可亵渎的

trans.tran_en: an inviolable right, law, principle etc is extremely important and should be treated with respect and not broken or removed
